name: documenso
description: Documenso is an open-source, self-hosted e-signature solution. It lets you upload documents, place signature fields, invite signers, and track status from a modern web UI, providing a privacy-friendly alternative to commercial signing platforms.
features: Real-time Collaboration: Multiple users can edit documents simultaneously with live cursor tracking and conflict resolution to streamline team workflows.
Advanced Search: Full-text search across all content with filters, tags, and metadata indexing to quickly locate specific information.
Version Control: Automatic versioning with rollback capabilities and change tracking to maintain document history and prevent data loss.
API Integration: RESTful API endpoints for third-party integrations and automated workflows to extend platform functionality.
Analytics Dashboard: Visual metrics and usage statistics with customizable charts to track performance and user engagement.
Mobile Optimization: Responsive design with touch-friendly interfaces and offline sync capabilities for seamless mobile access.
Notification System: Configurable alerts via email, push, or in-app notifications to keep users informed of important updates.
Theme Customization: Multiple UI themes and layout options with custom branding support to match organizational identity.
